Oscar Insurance (NY)- tech start-up in Manhattan, with $150mil in funding from our Series A round. We're a new kind of health insurance company that is using technology to make insurance simple, intuitive, and human. In other words, the kind of healthcare we want for ourselves.

Positions:

Android - First Android developer! Have you built an Android application from the ground up? We'd love to talk.

Front end developer - You've got expert knowledge of web technologies (HTML/CSS) and an understanding of the full web technology stack (e.g. HTTP, cookies, headers, asset loading/caching). You have a disciplined approach to testing and quality assurance

Platform engineers- Can write thoughtful software in a systems language like Java, C++, or go, and a scripting language like Python or Ruby.

Apply online and spread the good word! www.hioscar.com/jobs
